conclusion: Analyze the image to understand the flow path of the liquid through the baffles.
The image shows containers A, B, C, D, E, F, and G with colored lines representing baffles connecting these containers.
Baffles are positioned between the containers, guiding the flow of liquid.
Liquid from A flows through the baffle to E.
Liquid from B flows through the baffle to E.
Liquid from C flows through the baffle to F.
Liquid from D flows through the baffle to G.
E is connected to A and B, indicating liquid from A and B will flow into E.
F is connected to C, indicating liquid from C will flow into F.
G is connected to D, indicating liquid from D will flow into G.
Liquid from A and B will flow into E.
Liquid from C will flow into F.
Liquid from D will flow into G.
